modName: Blizzard Saber and Ultimate Superior Sword  fengyunwuqi
descriptionHtml:
感谢国家，感谢人民，感谢父母。
第一次做。花了一个星期时间把模型和贴图做出来，导入进去又花了差不多一个星期。
导入要感谢LY，感谢幻月。还有白忙了半天的老Z伯伯。
我的组织好像是ARROW&KNEE MOD TEAM，感谢组织。
Thank countries, thanks to the people, grateful parents. 
First time took a week to make time to model and map out, import into, and spent almost a week. 
Importing to thank LY, thanks magic month. There\'s the old white Manglebantian Z uncle. 
My organization is like ARROW & KNEE MOD TEAM, thanks organization
these are two swords from the chinese movie \"The Storm Riders\" by Aaron Kwok and Ekin 

Cheng. 
Which the movie is adapted from a chinese manhua \"Fung Wan\" by Artist Ma Wing-shing


Blizzard Saber used by Whispering Wind
Ultimate Superior Sword used by Striding Cloud 
these 

two swords can Forge in Smithing Forge(Daedric slot) and Enhanced in Smithing Sharpening 

Wheel

 Install:  Use Nexus Mod Manager to install or
              Drag the Data folder from 

this archive into your Skyrim folder
              Use NMM to Active fengyun.esp

Uninstall: 

Use Nexus Mod Manager to uninstall or direct delete all files.

Credits:
thanks to all [Arrow 

& Knee Mod Team] \'s members for great help

Enjoy it！
                                        

                                                  Mod by: wenboyu
author: wenboyu
